MemoryInfobox.description: 'As Kassandra had learned, any job is a good job - no matter how small. Ilos, a Kephallonian armorer, needed wolf furs for the war effort, and knew Kassandra could provide them easily.'

General_Description: '''Mercenary Work''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra came across a bounty work to collect several [[wolf]] pelts.
Section_Dialogue:
While in [[Sami]], Kassandra came across a contract placed on a [[message board]] by [[Ilos]], requesting her to collect several wolf pelts. After doing so, she returned to Ilos in Sami.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I should've known it was you who'd ask for the furs, Ilos.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''And I should've known it was you to get them for me. Kassandra is always on the job.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Don't tell [[Markos]], he'll get jealous.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''I post it publically to give the others a chance, but you're always so keen.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What are the pelts for this time?''
*'''Civilian:''' ''The [[Athens|Athenians]] want [[armor]] for the war. Good protection for them, good [[drachma]]e for me.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Here they are, all encountered for.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''In record time, too. Take your pay, it's well earned.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Stay out of trouble, Ilos.''
*'''Civilian:''' ''You should take your own advice!''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Ilos get wolf pelts for his new armors.
